recipe.title: Gluten Free Brownie
recipe.comment: c/o Cacao powder with cazzie tweaks
recipe.ingredient: 1/2 cup coconut oil melted and cooled
recipe.step: Grease rectangular dish and line with grease proof paper, then set aside.
Place dry ingredients in a bowl and stir to combine.
Stir in coconut oil then combined milk and eggs.
Stir well and pour into prepared dish.
Smooth over top and place in oven for 20 minutes or when centre is cooked.
Cool on wire rack, sprinkle over a little more cacao powder to decorate.
Cut into squares, and store in airtight container when completely cool.
